name: Park Gift Shop
description: A shop offering park-themed souvenirs, local crafts, and gift items.

name: Lakeview Bistro Restaurant
description: American restaurant,casual dining with burgers, salads, and sandwiches overlooking the park lake.

name: Meadow Cafe Restaurant
description: Italian restaurant,cozy cafe with wood-fired pizzas, pastas, and desserts.

name: Trailside Tacos Restaurant
description: Mexican restaurant,quick-service taco stand with fresh tacos, burritos, and nachos.

name: Park Clinic
description: On-site medical clinic for minor injuries and health consultations.
